faqQuestions.matchingAlgorithm: How does the matching algorithm work?
faqQuestions.premiumBenefits: What are the premium subscription benefits?

faqAnswers.resetPasswordAnswer: You can reset your password by following these steps:
resetPasswordSteps: Go to the login screen and tap "Forgot Password"
Enter the email address associated with your account
Check your email for a password reset link
Click the link and follow the instructions to create a new password
faqAnswers.resetPasswordNote: If you don't receive the email, please check your spam folder.
faqAnswers.matchingAlgorithmAnswer: Our intelligent matching system uses several factors to connect you with compatible people:
matchingAlgorithmFactors: Compatibility metrics based on your profile
faqAnswers.matchingAlgorithmNote: The more complete your profile, the better matches we can suggest.
faqAnswers.updateLocationAnswer: Your location is updated automatically when you use the app. If you want to change your location manually:
updateLocationSteps: Enter your new location or enable location permissions
faqAnswers.updateLocationNote: Note: Some location features may require a premium subscription.
faqAnswers.reportBehaviorAnswer: We take user safety seriously. To report someone:
reportBehaviorSteps: Tap the three dots (⋮) in the top right corner
Choose the reason for reporting and provide details
faqAnswers.reportBehaviorNote: Our moderation team reviews all reports thoroughly and takes appropriate action.
faqAnswers.premiumBenefitsAnswer: Premium subscribers enjoy these exclusive features:
faqAnswers.premiumBenefitsNote: Visit the Subscription tab in Settings to upgrade.

guideContent.meetDescription: Connect with singles who share your Ghanaian heritage through cultural matching
guideContent.heatDescription: Join community conversations and events with real-time social features
guideContent.suiteDescription: Build professional networks within the Ghanaian business community
quickSetupSteps: Complete your profile with authentic photos and verification
Set your dating preferences and interests with advanced filters
Choose your main focus: Dating, Community, or Professional networking
Enable location services for local connections and discovery
Start swiping, chatting, or networking based on your chosen mode
essentialFeaturesList: Smart Matching: AI-powered compatibility based on culture, values, and interests
Ghost Mode: Browse profiles privately without being seen
Story Sharing: Share moments from your day with the community
Cultural Filters: Find people from specific Ghanaian tribes or regions
firstMessageTips: Reference something specific from their profile (shows genuine interest)
Ask questions about their interests or experiences rather than just saying "hi"
Share something about yourself to start a two-way conversation
Use humor appropriately, but avoid offensive or overly personal jokes
Keep it concise but thoughtful and engaging
advancedFeaturesList: Read Receipts: See when messages are read for better communication
Voice Messages: Send audio clips for more personal connection
Photo Sharing: Share moments directly in chat conversations
Auto-Delete Messages: Set messages to disappear for privacy
Typing Indicators: Real-time conversation flow and engagement
conversationDos: Move to video calls when comfortable
photoTips: Main Photo: Clear face shot with natural lighting and genuine smile
Full Body Photo: Full-body shot showing your style and personality
Activity Photo: You doing something you love (hobby, sport, travel)
Social Photo: With friends/family (shows you're socially connected)
Cultural Photo: Celebrating Ghanaian traditions or events
Professional Photo: For SUITE networking and business connections
bioTips: Start with what makes you unique (personality trait or passion)
Mention your Ghanaian heritage and what it means to you
Add a conversation starter or question
Stay positive and authentic (avoid negative statements)
Use emojis sparingly for visual appeal and personality
profileCompletionList: Fill out all sections (100% completion increases matches by 40%)
Link your social media for more photos and personality
Add your music playlist to show your music taste
Set precise location and dating radius
Update regularly with new photos and experiences

contactForm.describeYourIssue: Describe your issue or question in detail
contactForm.urgentMatters: For urgent matters, call us directly

safetyGuide.safetyPrivacySubtitle: Stay safe while creating authentic connections
privacyControls: Ghost Mode: Browse profiles without being seen by others
Profile Visibility: Control who can see your profile and information
Location Privacy: Share general area, not exact location
Photo Protection: Prevent screenshots with notification alerts
Incognito Messaging: Chat without revealing online status
redFlags: Refuses video calls or in-person meetings after prolonged messaging
Asks for money, gifts, or financial information early on
Has very few photos or photos that seem too professional
Avoids answering specific questions about their background
Pressures you to move conversations off the app immediately
Uses photos that seem too perfect or professional
safeMeeting: Always meet in public places for first dates
Tell a trusted friend about your plans and location
Use the built-in location sharing feature for safety
Have your own transportation to and from the date
Video call before meeting to verify their identity
Trust your instincts - if something feels off, leave
reporting: Block users who make you uncomfortable
Take screenshots as evidence before blocking
Use the emergency contact feature if needed
Advanced AI monitors conversations for safety violations

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
troubleshooting.subtitle: Quick solutions for technical and app problems
appPerformance: Close and restart the app if it's running slowly
Update to the latest version from the App Store
Restart your device to free up memory
matching: Expand your age range and distance radius
Complete your profile with more photos and information
Reset your discovery preferences in settings
Be more active on the app to improve the algorithm
messaging: Check your internet connection if messages aren't sending
Refresh the app by pulling down in messages
Check if the other user has deleted the match
Restart the app if typing indicators aren't working
account: Reset your password if you can't log in
Check your email for verification links
Contact support if premium features aren't working
Log out and back in to sync data
contactSupport: Use the contact form below for assistance
Our team responds within 24 hours during business hours
For urgent issues, call our support line
Check the FAQ first for quick solutions

auth.passwordStrengthTip: Strong passwords include uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
auth.passwordMinEightChars: Password must be at least 8 characters

termsOfServiceContent.welcomeText: Welcome to CHARLéY! These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Kronogon, LLC ("CHARLéY," "we," "our") governing your access to and use of CHARLéY's dating, networking, and social connection platform, including our mobile applications, websites, and related services (collectively, the "Services").
termsOfServiceContent.agreementToTermsText: By creating an account, accessing, or using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you must not use our Services.
termsOfServiceContent.ageRequirementsText: Different features require different minimum ages: Dating Features (MEET): 14 years or older. Professional Networking (SUITE): 14 years or older. Age verification may be required.
termsOfServiceContent.geographicRestrictionsText: Our Services are intended for users in jurisdictions where such services are legal. You are responsible for compliance with local laws.
termsOfServiceContent.accountRegistrationText: You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration. You agree to promptly update your account information to maintain its accuracy.
termsOfServiceContent.accountSecurityText: You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and all activities under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access or security breaches. Keep your account secure by using strong, unique passwords and enabling two-factor authentication.
termsOfServiceContent.oneAccountPerPersonText: You may maintain only one account. Creating multiple accounts or allowing others to use your account is prohibited and may result in termination.
termsOfServiceContent.identityVerificationText: We may require identity verification at our discretion. Providing false information or impersonating others is prohibited.
termsOfServiceContent.contentLicenseText: You retain ownership of content you submit ("User Content"). By posting User Content, you grant CHARLéY a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable, and sublicensable license to use, copy, modify, distribute, publish, and process your User Content in connection with operating and improving our Services.
termsOfServiceContent.contentStandardsText: User Content must not contain or promote:

contentStandardsList.0: Illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, or discriminatory content
contentStandardsList.1: Hate speech, harassment, or content targeting individuals based on protected characteristics
contentStandardsList.2: Sexually explicit material, nudity, or content promoting sexual services
contentStandardsList.4: Spam, malware, phishing attempts, or deceptive practices
contentStandardsList.5: Intellectual property violations or unauthorized use of others' content
contentStandardsList.7: Content impersonating others or providing false information
contentStandardsList.8: Promotional content, commercial solicitation, or unauthorized advertising

prohibitedConductList.0: Use our Services for commercial purposes without authorization
prohibitedConductList.1: Create fake profiles or misrepresent your identity, age, or characteristics
prohibitedConductList.2: Harass, stalk, threaten, or harm other users
prohibitedConductList.3: Attempt to access other users' accounts or private information
prohibitedConductList.4: Use automated tools, bots, or scripts to access our Services
prohibitedConductList.5: Reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract source code
prohibitedConductList.6: Interfere with security features or functionality of our Services
prohibitedConductList.7: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
prohibitedConductList.8: Collect user information for unsolicited communications
prohibitedConductList.9: Engage in financial fraud or solicit money from other users

termsOfServiceContent.aiTechnologyText: CHARLéY uses artificial intelligence, machine learning algorithms, and automated systems to enhance user experience, including profile recommendations, content moderation, and matching services.
termsOfServiceContent.matchingDisclaimerText: Our matching algorithms are tools to facilitate connections. We do not guarantee compatibility, successful relationships, or specific outcomes. User safety and judgment remain paramount.
termsOfServiceContent.contentModerationText: We use automated systems and human review to moderate content. We reserve the right to remove content or suspend accounts that violate our standards.
termsOfServiceContent.subscriptionServicesText: CHARLéY may offer premium features via subscription plans. Subscription terms, including pricing and billing cycles, are specified at purchase.
termsOfServiceContent.autoRenewalText: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled before the renewal date. You may cancel via your account settings or platform-specific procedures.
termsOfServiceContent.refundsText: Refunds are generally not provided for unused subscription periods, except as required by law or our refund policy.
termsOfServiceContent.virtualItemsText: All virtual gifts, boosts, or digital items have no monetary value and are non-transferable and non-refundable.
termsOfServiceContent.privacyPolicyText: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information. By using our Services, you consent to our data practices as described in our Privacy Policy.
termsOfServiceContent.locationDataText: We may collect and use location information to provide location-based features. You can control location sharing through your device settings.
termsOfServiceContent.communicationsText: By using our Services, you consent to receive communications from us, including promotional messages, which you may unsubscribe from at any time.
termsOfServiceContent.charleyIpText: The Services, including all content, features, functionality, trademarks, service marks, logos, and trade names, are owned by Kronogon or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, patent, and other intellectual property laws.
termsOfServiceContent.limitedLicenseText: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our Services for individual, non-commercial purposes, subject to these Terms. Recruiters and institutional representatives are solely responsible for obtaining appropriate organizational approvals and ensuring compliance with their employer's policies before using our Services in any professional capacity.
termsOfServiceContent.copyrightPolicyText: We respond to copyright infringement notices in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). To report copyright infringement, contact us at admin@kronogon.com.
termsOfServiceContent.thirdPartyLinksText: Our Services may contain links to third-party websites, applications, or services. We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or terms of third-party services.
termsOfServiceContent.socialMediaIntegrationText: If you connect social media accounts, you authorize us to access certain information from those platforms as described in our Privacy Policy.
termsOfServiceContent.appStoreTermsText: If you download our app through an app store, additional terms from that platform may apply.
termsOfServiceContent.userSafetyText: While we implement security measures, you are responsible for your personal safety when interacting with other users. Exercise caution during in-person meetings and consider meeting in public places.
termsOfServiceContent.reportingText: Report suspicious behavior, harassment, or safety concerns through our reporting features. We investigate reports and may take appropriate action.
termsOfServiceContent.backgroundChecksText: We do not conduct background checks on users. You are responsible for evaluating the suitability of other users.
termsOfServiceContent.terminationByYouText: You may terminate your account at any time through account settings. Upon termination, your profile will be deactivated, though certain information may be retained as described in our Privacy Policy.
termsOfServiceContent.terminationByUsText: We may suspend, restrict, or terminate your account immediately without notice if you violate these Terms, engage in illegal activity, or for any other reason at our sole discretion.
termsOfServiceContent.effectOfTerminationText: Upon termination, all licenses granted to you end, and you must cease using our Services. Provisions that by their nature should survive termination will continue to apply.
termsOfServiceContent.asIsBasisText: OUR SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
termsOfServiceContent.noGuaranteesText: We do not guarantee that our Services will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or that particular results will be achieved.
termsOfServiceContent.userInteractionsText: We are not responsible for user conduct, interactions, or content. Users interact at their own risk.
termsOfServiceContent.damagesLimitationText: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, BAOBAB TECHNOLOGIES, ITS AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AND AGENTS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, PUNITIVE, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES ARISING FROM OR RELATED TO THESE TERMS OR YOUR USE OF OUR SERVICES.
termsOfServiceContent.totalLiabilityCapText: Our total liability to you for all claims shall not exceed the higher of $100 or the amount you paid to us in the 12 months preceding the claim.
termsOfServiceContent.userResponsibilityText: You acknowledge that your use of online dating and social networking services involves inherent risks, and you assume all responsibility for interactions with other users.
termsOfServiceContent.indemnificationText: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Kronogon, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from all claims, damages, losses, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorney fees) arising from: (a) your use of our Services; (b) your User Content; (c) your violation of these Terms; or (d) your violation of another person's or entity's rights.
termsOfServiceContent.mandatoryArbitrationText: Any dispute, claim, or controversy arising from or relating to these Terms or our Services will be settled by binding arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association under its Consumer Arbitration Rules.
termsOfServiceContent.classActionWaiverText: YOU AND BAOBAB TECHNOLOGIES AGREE THAT EACH PARTY MAY BRING CLAIMS AGAINST THE OTHER ONLY IN AN INDIVIDUAL CAPACITY AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE ACTION.
termsOfServiceContent.arbitrationLocationText: Arbitration will take place in San Francisco, California, or another mutually agreed location.
termsOfServiceContent.exceptionsText: Either party may seek injunctive relief in court for intellectual property violations or other equitable relief.
termsOfServiceContent.governingLawText: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any legal action not subject to arbitration will be brought exclusively in federal or state courts located in San Francisco, California.
termsOfServiceContent.updatesText: We may modify these Terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated through our Services, email, or other reasonable means at least 30 days before they take effect.
termsOfServiceContent.continuedUseText: Your continued use of our Services after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.
termsOfServiceContent.disagreementText: If you do not agree with modified Terms, you must stop using our Services and may terminate your account.
termsOfServiceContent.entireAgreementText: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and CHARLéY regarding our Services.
termsOfServiceContent.severabilityText: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full effect.
termsOfServiceContent.noWaiverText: Our failure to exercise a right or provision does not constitute a waiver of that right or provision.
termsOfServiceContent.assignmentText: You may not assign or transfer these Terms without our written consent. We may assign these Terms without restriction.
termsOfServiceContent.forceMajeureText: We are not liable for delays or failures due to circumstances beyond our reasonable control.
termsOfServiceContent.supportContact: For customer support, safety concerns, or to report violations, please contact us through the app's support features or email support@kronogon.com.
termsOfServiceContent.finalAcknowledgment: BY USING CHARLéY, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTOOD, AND AGREED TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS OF SERVICE.

privacyPolicyContent.welcomeText: Welcome to CHARLéY! This Privacy Policy describes how Kronogon, LLC ("CHARLéY," "we," "our") collects, uses, discloses, and protects your personal information when you use our dating, networking, and social connection services, including mobile applications, websites, and related services (collectively, the "Services").
privacyPolicyContent.accountInformationText: Name, email address, phone number, password, date of birth, gender, sexual orientation
privacyPolicyContent.profileInformationText: Photos, videos, biography, interests, preferences, education, occupation, location
privacyPolicyContent.datingNetworkingPreferencesText: Age range, distance, relationship goals, deal-breakers, professional interests
privacyPolicyContent.communicationsText: Messages, comments, reactions, and other interactions with users
privacyPolicyContent.paymentInformationText: Credit card details, debit card information, bank account details, mobile money identifiers, billing address, subscription information (processed by third-party providers)
privacyPolicyContent.verificationDataText: Identity verification documents, phone verification codes
privacyPolicyContent.userGeneratedContentText: Reviews, testimonials, surveys, contest participation, feedback
privacyPolicyContent.customerSupportCommunicationsText: Support requests, bug reports, feature requests
privacyPolicyContent.deviceInformationText: Device type, operating system, browser type, device identifiers, mobile carrier
privacyPolicyContent.usageDataText: Features accessed, time spent, interaction patterns, swiping data, matching behavior
privacyPolicyContent.locationInformationText: GPS coordinates, IP address location, location preferences (with consent)
privacyPolicyContent.technicalDataText: Log files, crash reports, performance metrics, debugging information
privacyPolicyContent.networkInformationText: IP address, connection type, internet service provider
privacyPolicyContent.behavioralAnalyticsText: User engagement patterns, feature usage statistics, session duration
privacyPolicyContent.socialMediaText: Profile information from connected social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn)
privacyPolicyContent.identityVerificationServicesText: Age and identity verification data from third-party providers
privacyPolicyContent.paymentProcessorsText: Transaction data and payment status from Stripe, Apple Pay, Google Pay
privacyPolicyContent.analyticsPartnersText: Demographic and behavioral information from authorized data partners
privacyPolicyContent.marketingPartnersText: Attribution data and advertising effectiveness metrics

coreServiceFunctionsList.0: Create and maintain your account and profile
coreServiceFunctionsList.1: Facilitate matching algorithms and recommend compatible users
coreServiceFunctionsList.2: Enable messaging, video calls, and real-time interactions
coreServiceFunctionsList.4: Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
coreServiceFunctionsList.5: Verify user identity and prevent fraudulent accounts

platformSafetyAndSecurityList.0: Detect and prevent spam, fraud, and harmful behavior
platformSafetyAndSecurityList.1: Monitor violations of our Terms of Service
platformSafetyAndSecurityList.2: Investigate reports of abuse, harassment, or inappropriate content
platformSafetyAndSecurityList.3: Implement safety features and user protection measures
platformSafetyAndSecurityList.4: Comply with legal obligations and law enforcement requests

serviceImprovementAndPersonalizationList.0: Analyze usage patterns to improve features and user experience
serviceImprovementAndPersonalizationList.1: Develop and test new products, features, and services
serviceImprovementAndPersonalizationList.3: Conduct research and analytics for business insights
serviceImprovementAndPersonalizationList.4: Optimize matching algorithms and recommendation systems

communicationsAndMarketingList.1: Deliver marketing communications and promotional offers (with consent)
communicationsAndMarketingList.2: Notify you of new matches, messages, and platform activity
communicationsAndMarketingList.3: Provide important account and security information

withOtherUsersList.0: Profile information, photos, and preferences in discovery features
withOtherUsersList.1: Messages, reactions, and interaction history with matched users
withOtherUsersList.2: Online status, last seen information, and activity indicators
withOtherUsersList.3: Shared interests, mutual connections, and compatibility scores

withServiceProvidersList.0: Cloud Infrastructure: Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud for data storage and processing
withServiceProvidersList.1: Payment Processing: Stripe, Apple, Google for subscription and transaction processing
withServiceProvidersList.2: Analytics: Google Analytics, Mixpanel for usage analysis and optimization
withServiceProvidersList.3: Customer Support: Zendesk, Intercom for support ticket management
withServiceProvidersList.4: Communications: Twilio, SendGrid for SMS and email delivery
withServiceProvidersList.5: Content Moderation: AI-powered services for automated content review
withServiceProvidersList.6: Identity Verification: Jumio, Onfido for age and identity verification

forLegalAndSafetyReasonsList.0: Law enforcement agencies when required by valid legal process
forLegalAndSafetyReasonsList.1: Emergency services to prevent imminent danger to individuals
forLegalAndSafetyReasonsList.2: Legal counsel and courts in connection with legal proceedings
forLegalAndSafetyReasonsList.3: Regulatory authorities for compliance with applicable laws
forLegalAndSafetyReasonsList.4: Safety organizations to investigate reported harmful behavior

privacyPolicyContent.businessTransfersText: In the event of merger, acquisition, bankruptcy, or asset sale, your information may be transferred to the acquiring entity, subject to the same privacy protections described in this policy.

accountControlList.0: Profile Management: Edit, update, or delete profile information and photos
accountControlList.1: Privacy Settings: Control profile visibility, discovery preferences, and interaction settings
accountControlList.2: Communication Preferences: Manage notification settings and marketing communications
accountControlList.3: Blocking and Reporting: Block users, report inappropriate behavior, and hide from specific users

privacyPolicyContent.dataRights: 4.2 Data Rights (GDPR, CCPA, and Similar Laws):

dataRightsList.0: Access: Request a copy of personal information we hold about you
dataRightsList.1: Portability: Obtain your data in a structured, machine-readable format
dataRightsList.2: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate personal information
dataRightsList.3: Deletion: Request deletion of your account and associated data
dataRightsList.4: Restriction: Limit how we process your personal information
dataRightsList.5: Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
dataRightsList.6: Consent Withdrawal: Revoke previously given consent for data processing

deviceAndBrowserControlsList.0: Location Services: Enable or disable location sharing via device settings
deviceAndBrowserControlsList.1: Push Notifications: Control app notifications via device or app settings
deviceAndBrowserControlsList.2: Camera and Microphone: Manage app permissions for media access
deviceAndBrowserControlsList.3: Cookies: Adjust browser settings to control cookie usage

technicalSafeguardsList.0: End-to-end encryption for private messages and sensitive data
technicalSafeguardsList.2: Advanced firewalls and intrusion detection systems
technicalSafeguardsList.3: Regular security audits and penetration testing
technicalSafeguardsList.5: Secure data centers with physical access controls

operationalSecurityList.0: Employee background checks and security training
operationalSecurityList.1: Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
operationalSecurityList.2: Regular software updates and security patches
operationalSecurityList.3: Incident response procedures for data breaches
operationalSecurityList.4: Data retention policies and secure deletion practices

privacyPolicyContent.dataBreachResponseText: In case of a data breach affecting personal information, we will notify affected users and relevant authorities within 72 hours as required by applicable laws, and take immediate measures to secure the platform and prevent further unauthorized access.
privacyPolicyContent.activeAccountsText: We retain your information as long as your account is active and as needed to provide services.
privacyPolicyContent.accountDeletionText: When you delete your account, we:

accountDeletionList.0: Remove your profile from discovery and matching algorithms within 24 hours
accountDeletionList.1: Delete personal information within 30 days, except as noted below
accountDeletionList.2: Retain anonymized usage data for service improvement
accountDeletionList.3: Preserve certain data as required by law or for legitimate business purposes

legalRetentionRequirementsList.0: Transaction records (7 years for tax and financial compliance)
legalRetentionRequirementsList.1: Security and safety incident reports (5 years)
legalRetentionRequirementsList.2: Legal dispute documentation (until resolution plus statute of limitations)
legalRetentionRequirementsList.3: Age verification records (as required by jurisdiction)

privacyPolicyContent.globalOperationsText: CHARLéY operates globally, and your information may be transferred to and processed in the United States and other countries where we or our service providers operate.
privacyPolicyContent.transferSafeguardsText: We implement appropriate safeguards for international transfers, including:

transferSafeguardsList.0: Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission
transferSafeguardsList.1: Adequacy decisions for countries with sufficient privacy protections
transferSafeguardsList.2: Binding Corporate Rules for intra-group transfers
transferSafeguardsList.3: Certification schemes such as Privacy Shield successors

privacyPolicyContent.artificialIntelligenceAndAutomatedDecisi: 8. ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND AUTOMATED DECISION MAKING
privacyPolicyContent.aiPoweredFeaturesText: We use AI and machine learning for:

yourAiRightsList.0: Receive information about automated decision-making that significantly affects you
yourAiRightsList.1: Request human review of automated decisions
yourAiRightsList.2: Contest the logic and accuracy of automated systems
yourAiRightsList.3: Opt out of certain automated processing where technically feasible

privacyPolicyContent.ageRequirementsText: Different features require different minimum ages: Dating Features (MEET/HEAT): 18 years or older. Professional Networking (SUITE): 14 years or older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the applicable minimum age for each feature.
privacyPolicyContent.underageAccountDetectionText: If we discover that an account belongs to someone under the applicable minimum age for the features they access, we will:

underageAccountDetectionList.0: Immediately delete the account and all associated data
underageAccountDetectionList.1: Remove the user from all discovery and matching systems
underageAccountDetectionList.2: Notify relevant authorities if required by law
underageAccountDetectionList.3: Implement additional verification measures to prevent re-registration

californiaPrivacyRightsList.0: Right to know what personal information is collected and how it's used
californiaPrivacyRightsList.1: Right to delete personal information subject to certain exceptions
californiaPrivacyRightsList.2: Right to opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information
californiaPrivacyRightsList.3: Right to non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights
californiaPrivacyRightsList.4: Right to correct inaccurate personal information
californiaPrivacyRightsList.5: Right to limit use of sensitive personal information

europeanPrivacyRightsList.0: Legal basis for processing (consent, legitimate interest, contract execution)
europeanPrivacyRightsList.1: Right to withdraw consent and object to processing
europeanPrivacyRightsList.2: Right to data portability and erasure
europeanPrivacyRightsList.3: Right to file complaints with supervisory authorities
europeanPrivacyRightsList.4: Data Protection Officer contact for privacy requests

typesOfCookiesWeUseList.0: Essential Cookies: Required for basic platform functionality and security
typesOfCookiesWeUseList.1: Performance Cookies: Analytics and optimization data
typesOfCookiesWeUseList.2: Functional Cookies: User preferences and personalization settings
typesOfCookiesWeUseList.3: Advertising Cookies: Targeted advertising and marketing measurement

thirdPartyTrackingList.0: Google Analytics for website and app usage analysis
thirdPartyTrackingList.1: Facebook Pixel for advertising attribution and optimization
thirdPartyTrackingList.2: Branch.io for deep linking and app attribution
thirdPartyTrackingList.3: Mixpanel for user behavioral analysis and funnel analysis

privacyPolicyContent.policyChangesText: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors.

notificationProcessList.0: Material changes will be communicated 30 days in advance
notificationProcessList.1: Notifications sent via email and in-app messages
notificationProcessList.3: Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes
notificationProcessList.4: Right to delete account if you disagree with changes

privacyPolicyContent.contactInformationAndExercisingYourRight: 13. CONTACT INFORMATION AND EXERCISING YOUR RIGHTS

exercisingPrivacyRightsList.0: Submit requests via our in-app privacy portal
exercisingPrivacyRightsList.1: Email privacy@kronogon.com with your request and account details
exercisingPrivacyRightsList.2: We will respond to verified requests within 30 days
exercisingPrivacyRightsList.3: Identity verification may be required for security purposes
exercisingPrivacyRightsList.4: Authorized agents may submit requests on your behalf with appropriate documentation

complaintsAndDisputesList.0: EU Residents: Contact your local Data Protection Authority
complaintsAndDisputesList.2: California Residents: California Attorney General's Office
complaintsAndDisputesList.3: Other jurisdictions: Relevant privacy regulatory authority

privacyPolicyContent.transparencyCommitmentText: We believe in transparent data practices. This policy explains exactly how your information is processed to help you make informed decisions about using CHARLéY.

auth.pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
auth.invalidCountryCode: Phone number must include country code (e.g., +1...)
auth.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.enterValidDeliverableEmail: This email address does not exist or cannot receive emails
auth.pleaseUploadPhoto: Please upload at least one photo
auth.photoTipsDescription: Use the icons on your photos to change, delete, or set as primary. You can manage your photos anytime in your profile settings after registration.
auth.idVerificationDescription: Verify your identity to get a verification badge on your profile. This step is optional but helps build trust with other users.
auth.acceptTermsCheckbox: I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions
auth.reviewAndAcceptTerms: Please review and accept our Terms and Conditions
auth.welcomeToCharleyTerms: Welcome to CHARLéY! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our platform and services. By creating an account, you agree to comply with these terms.
auth.acceptanceOfTermsText: By creating an account, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy.
auth.eligibilityText: You must be at least 14 years old to create an account on CHARLéY. By creating an account, you represent and warrant that you are at least 14 years old.
auth.accountSecurityText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other security breach.
auth.userConductIntro: You agree not to use the service to:
auth.userConductItem1: Post false, misleading, or deceptive content
auth.userConductItem2: Harass, abuse, or harm another person
auth.userConductItem5: Collect or store personal data on other users without their consent
auth.contentText: You are solely responsible for the content you post, including photos, messages, and profile information. You grant CHARLéY a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license to host, use, distribute, modify, run, copy, publicly display, translate, and create derivative works of your content.
auth.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our service, you consent to our data practices described in our Privacy Policy.
auth.terminationText: CHARLéY reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms or for any other reason.
auth.changesText: We may modify these Terms and Conditions from time to time. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically. Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of any changes.
auth.liabilityText: CHARLéY is provided 'as is' and 'as available'. We make no warranties, express or implied, regarding the reliability, availability, or accuracy of our service.
auth.contactText: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at admin@kronogon.com.
auth.emailVerifiedReady: Email verified and ready to receive messages
auth.resetCodeSentInstruction: We've sent a 7-digit code to {{email}}. Please enter it below.
auth.activateProfileTitle: Activate Your MEET Profile for Free
auth.activateProfileDescription: Your profile is currently hidden for privacy. To start discovering amazing people and let others find you, activate your profile now - completely free with no subscription required!
auth.privacyNote: You can change this setting anytime in Privacy and Data Controls
auth.activationFailedDescription: Profile activation failed. Please try again.

kwame.description: A revolutionary, culturally-intelligent relationship and career advisor that adapts to your unique background. Unlike generic AI assistants, KWAME understands your cultural values and provides personalized guidance for dating, professional networking, and social connections. With advanced personality assessments and photo transformation capabilities, KWAME offers deep compatibility insights and helps you present your best self while respecting your traditions and family values.
